explains: n. 表象，假象；外观，外貌；（情况或性质的）相似之处，类似；幽灵，幻影

sentences.en: Conversely, the stemma can also bestow a semblance of separation on manuscripts written within a few months of one another or even in the same room.
sentences.cn: 相反地，族谱也可以给几个月之内写的手稿一种分离的假象，甚至是在同一个房间里写的。

sentences.en: The ceasefire brought about a semblance of peace.
sentences.cn: 停火协定带来了表面的和平。

sentences.en: Life at last returned to some semblance of normality.
sentences.cn: 生活似乎终于恢复了正常。
